about_the_game:
In a world of the selfish, few are brave enough to stand up for what really matters - the shareholders!

At the Tau Ceti Corporation, we endeavour to deliver the highest value possible, for the lowest cost. As its director of logistics, you are entrusted with keeping the gears of industry turning, the revenue numbers going up every quarter, and the fatality numbers acceptably low.

It is up to you to steer the ship, literally and figuratively, no matter what the world may throw at you.

Welcome to your shift. It's going to be a busy one. Let's make some money for the Tau Ceti Corpo.

Merchants of the Stars is a "Space Traffic Control" game where you control cargo ships by clicking and dragging them, attempting to guide them to docks where they can unload. Be careful, if things get too chaotic and ships collide with one another or with other obstacles, such as black holes or asteroids, then you lose.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.04 / Fedora 21 / Debian 8
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM

name: Merchants of the Stars

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Pentium 4
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
